value.title: ‘I’m the Operator’: The Aftermath of a Self-Driving Tragedy

value.title: Baidu head stresses innovation in autonomous driving policies

value.title: Self-driving truck company TuSimple replaces CEO; shares plummet 22%
value.excerpt: TuSimple Holdings Inc. on Thursday said it was replacing its CEO in a decision it called part of a "planned executive succession," but which took Wall Street by surprise and caused its shares to plummet more than 20 percent.

value.title: Japan to amend traffic laws to promote self-driving vehicles-Nikkei
value.excerpt: Japan's government plans to amend traffic laws to allow level four autonomous vehicles to drive on some roads and will ask lawmakers to approve the change as early as this month, the Nikkei newspaper reported.

value.title: California Greenlights Cruise, Waymo Autonomous Vehicle Service
value.excerpt: Autonomous vehicle makers General Motors and Alphabet Inc. can now collect fares from passengers of self-driving cars in California.
